title: Guitar Player Presents Clapton, Beck, Page
features: magazine, one of the most credible and longstanding music publications,
Guitar Player Presents Clapton, Beck, Page

traces the mammoth and influential careers of the three most important guitarists in rock and roll – Eric Clapton, Jeff Beck, and Jimmy Page – with insightful interviews from the '60s and '70s to the present. Learn how these guitar heroes developed their styles and sounds
. It's all here – details on legendary collaborations, stories from the studio and the road, breakdowns on gear, early influences, musical philosophies, secrets and tricks. Thrill to

assessments of their technique, tone, and creativity over the years. Share in the musical triumphs, disappointments, goals, and dreams of three men who forever shaped the sound of rock guitar. Also included are style lessons and licks from
's staff of music writers and transcribers that will help you crack the code of how these giants crafted their magic.
description: (San Francisco, CA'), 'growing up amidst the music, cultural rebellion, and hopefulness of San Francisco's Summer of Love, learned that guitars could (sometimes) topple tyrants.
